name: Parkour Piggies
description:
Developed for GUDEV October 2018 game jam.
Theme: deceit. Find out how this is incorporated in the last level ; )
Player 1 controls: Arrow keys and "/" to jump
Player 2 controls: WASD and space to jump

Programming: Josh, Noel, Iain, Dasha, Peter
Art: Yasmin, Noel, Iain
Level design: Michael, Noel, Yasmin, Iain
Music: Peter
